channel.title: Daily Newsletter
channel.description: Daily curated headlines from around the world.

item.title: Truth Social Crashes as Trump Live-Posts Bombing Iran
item.description: The social network started experiencing global outages within minutes of Donald Trump posting details of a US military strike on Iran.

item.title: A GPS Blackout Would Shut Down the World
item.description: GPS jamming and spoofing attacks are on the rise. If the global navigation system the US relies on were to go down entirely, it would send the world into unprecedented chaos.

item.title: Rising Seas Could Displace Millions, Triggering Global Migration Crisis, Study Warns
item.description: Scientists issue a dire warning that even the 1.5 degrees Celsius warming target is too high and will have catastrophic consequences for coastal populations.
